WorkItem.Description:
If this has been covered, I apologize in advance.  I couldn't find anything about it.

Does MVVM Light work with VS2015?  when I search for extensions and updates, I cannot find MVVM Light in 2015 (no problem in 2013).  I can add MVVM Light through the nugget package manager.  but I don't get the auto entry when trying to shortcut entering mvvm in the IDE to create properties, etc.

Comments.Message:
HI,

It is not officially released yet but I copied the VSIX below. It should work fine. Please let me know if you find any problem.

Take care
Laurent

Hi,

As i see there is no version for VS2015 RC.

But only you need to do is edit the file extension.vsixmanifest in downloaded version MvvmLight.VS2013.vsix
Change Installation Target value from 13.0 to 15.0 and it helps.

Best regards,
Alexiej
the .vsix file worked like a charm!  thanks a lot!  I am using MVVMLight on a project using Windows 10 IoT Core on a raspberry pi.  this works great.

Hi, I installed MvvmLight.VS2015.vsix on VS Community 2015, Windows 8.1. MvvmLightCSharpSnippets for WPF puts identical snippets for all 4 variations of INPC "Set" Property, INPC Property, RelayCommand and RelayCommand Generic.
